workshop.title: Oracle GoldenGate Microservices Architecture Hands-On Workshop
workshop.description: These labs will give you a basic understanding of the Oracle GoldenGate Microservices Architecture and many of the capabilities around administration and replication configuration.  The labs will walk you through creating multiple topologies with different use-case(s).  You will explore some common use cases for moving your data from Oracle to Oracle, bi-directional and heterogeneous databases.

versions.name: Hands-On Labs
versions.description: An in-person workshop with an Oracle instructor

versions.name: Download Presentation
versions.description: Introduction and Overview of Oracle GoldenGate Microservices Architecture

labs.title: Lab 100: Install GG Microservices Architecture
labs.description: Install the Oracle GoldenGate Microservces for Oracle in the target environment using the Oracle Universal Installer (OUI) tool.

labs.title: Lab 200: Creating Deployments
labs.description: After Installation create the Oracle GoldenGate Microservices Deployments

labs.title: Lab 300: Creating Credentials
labs.description: Creating Database Credentials for Oracle GoldenGate Microservices setup

labs.title: Lab 400: Uni Directional and DDL Replication
labs.description: Using Web interface of Oracle GoldenGate Microservices (HTML5 Pages)

labs.title: Lab 500: Zero Downtime Configuration
labs.description: Doing file based data migration using the MicroServices architecture and the REST API for automation

labs.title: Lab 600: Bi-Directional and Auto Conflict Detection and Resolution(CDR)
labs.description: Use CDR functions to setup Auto-CDR in the database with Oracle GoldenGate Microservices

labs.title: Lab 700: Heterogeneous Replication
labs.description: Setup Oracle GoldenGate for MySQL using classic Architecture and Oracle GoldenGate for Oracle using Microservices Architecture for Uni-directional replication

labs.title: Lab 800: Data Transformations
labs.description: Demonstrate use of Oracle GoldenGate Microservices for transformation capabilities like column concatenating, data masking and use of environment variables/tokens

labs.title: Lab 900: Performance Metrics
labs.description: View the detailed replication statistics in real-time with the Oracle GoldenGate Metric Service in Microservices Architecture

labs.title: Lab 9100: Replicating into Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse from Heterogeneous database
labs.description: Setup Oracle GoldenGate for MySQL using classic Architecture and Oracle GoldenGate for Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse using Microservices Architecture for Uni-directional replication

labs.title: Setup Steps for Self Guided Labs
Lab 100: Introduction
labs.description: Create and access a Database Cloud Instance

labs.title: Lab 200: Cloud Migration
labs.description: Explore some common use cases for moving your data from on-premise to the cloud

labs.title: Lab 300: DBCS Maintenance
labs.description: Perform some common DBA tasks such as setting up security access and scaling out your instance.

labs.title: Lab 400: CLI/Curl Commands (Programatic Control of Services)
labs.description: Review 'get' and 'put' curl commands to monitor and control DBCS cloud services
